Title: Baaki Itihaas
Actors: Zakir Hussain, Amruta Khanvilkar, Ravi Khanvilkar, Girija Oak
Plot: A timeless Bengali classic, exploring the history of mankind. Through the story of 40-year old Sitanath's suicide, Sharad and Vasanthi force the audience to introspect and analyse their self-centered and monotonous lives.
